name: Youtube HTML5 ‒ Access <video> context menu
description: this script allows you to click through alle the crap youtube has layered upon the video tag, allowing you to access it’s context menu
additional_info:
You’ll need to disable youtube’s ability to suppress the context menu if you want to see it:
* with firefox, this is a setting: Settings -> “Content” -> Javascript (“Advanced”) -> Uncheck “Replace or remove context menu”
* with chome and such, you’ll need “Allow Right Click”: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/hompjdfbfmmmgflfjdlnkohcplmboaeo
